articles.title: Donald Trump Appoints Kari Lake To Lead Voice Of America - Deadline
articles.description: The choice suggests that Trump will try to overhaul the news outlet.
articles.content:
Donald Trump has appointed Kari Lake as the director of the Voice Of America, tapping an unabashed loyalist for the U.S. government’s international broadcast network.
